title: Overlay Image on Matplotlib Plot
description: This tutorial will show you how to overlay an image on a Matplotlib plot by moving it to the front and making it semi-transparent. The tutorial uses the figimage method from the matplotlib.figure.Figure class and the imread method from the matplotlib.image module.
